title._content: Image taken from page 253 of 'The White Wife; with other stories, supernatural, romantic and legendary; collected and illustrated by Cuthbert Bede'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The White Wife; with other stories, supernatural, romantic and legendary; collected and illustrated by Cuthbert Bede" Author: BEDE, Cuthbert - pseud. [i.e. Edward Bradley.] Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12631.aaa.4." Page: 253 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1865 Publisher: Sampson Low & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000247794 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
